title: Hobbies: Reading (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Reading subcategory within Hobbies. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.romaji: Sukina manga wa nan desu ka.
cards.japanese: 好きな漫画は何ですか。

cards.romaji: Kono hon wa totemo omoshiroi desu.
cards.japanese: この本はとても面白いです。
